This playbook handles incidents triggered in the PANW IoT (Zingbox) UI by sending the alert to ServiceNow.

## Dependencies
This playbook uses the following sub-playbooks, integrations, and scripts.

### Sub-playbooks
This playbook does not use any sub-playbooks.

### Integrations
* Palo Alto Networks IoT 3rd Party
* ServiceNow v2

### Scripts
This playbook does not use any scripts.

### Commands
* closeInvestigation
* panw-iot-3rd-party-convert-assets-to-external-format
* servicenow-create-record
* panw-iot-3rd-party-get-single-asset
* panw-iot-3rd-party-report-status-to-panw

## Playbook Inputs
---
There are no inputs for this playbook.

## Playbook Outputs
---
There are no outputs for this playbook.
